title: Comparison of quality and oxidative stability of pumpkin seed oil (Cucurbita maxima) between conventional and enzymatic extraction methods

Pumpkin seed oil was obtained from three extraction methods, namely Soxhlet extraction (SE), cold-pressed extraction (CPE), and aqueous enzymatic extraction (AEE). The impact of the extraction method on physicochemical parameters,...
